title: Blended Learning 4.0 Design for Higher Education Sustainability and Education 4.0

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and general understanding of higher education systems
context.additional_context: A course for in-service professionals, reconstructing Education 4.0 and sustainability concepts into practical applications.

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans using the Blended Learning 4.0 framework
Learners can design sustainable educational solutions utilizing digital technologies (mobile LMS, open-source content)
Learners can demonstrate team collaboration and problem-solving competencies in Education 4.0 environments through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
